entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.2°C

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h except 50 near the water. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
